remarks: The identity is an isomorphism.  Example 3.13 of [Adamek] p. 28. (Contributed by AV, 8-Apr-2017.)
statement:
invid.b $e |- B = ( Base ` C ) $.
invid.i $e |- I = ( Id ` C ) $.
invid.c $e |- ( ph -> C e. Cat ) $.
invid.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. B ) $.
idiso $p |- ( ph -> ( I ` X ) e. ( X ( Iso ` C ) X ) ) $.
